_description: A Christmas carol — four quatrains each ending with a Latin line, and burden: ‘To blys God bryng vs al & sum / Christe redemptor omnium’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
In bedlem þat fayer cytewas born a chyld þat was so
                    fre…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Now to mak mery a mong vsExultet celum
                    laudibus

OxfBal354.First Lines:
In Bedlem in that fayer citeA chyld was born of owr
                    Lady…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Be all mery in thys howseExvltet celum
                    lavdibusExplicit

OxfLinLat141.First Lines:
In bedleem in þat fayre cyteA chyld was borne of owre
                    lady…
OxfLinLat141.Last Lines:
…hym to serwe god gif vs graceO lux beata
                    trinitas

Palti,  Kathleen. 
             “An Unpublished Fifteenth-Century Carol Collection: Oxford, Lincoln
                College MS Lat. 141.”

CULEe112.First Lines:
In bethelem that fayre citeBorne was thys chylde so fayere
                    fre…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…for owr synys cry we all mercyJesu saluator
                    seculi
CULEe112.Note:
Burden varies: ‘Synge we now both all and sum / criste Redemtor
                        omnium’.

Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 14-16; 1977, 11.

CamTCC1230.First Lines:
In bedleem in þat fayr ceteA child was born of a madyn
                    fre…
CamTCC1230.Last Lines:
…Make we mery a mongys vsExultet celum
                    laudibus
CamTCC1230.Note:
Variant burden: ‘Nowel syng we now al & sum / ffor rex
                        pacificus is cum’.

BLAdd31042.Transcription: In bathelem in that fare seteIhesus was borne of mare frefor he ys prens
BLAdd31042.Note: Fragment, first three lines only (stanza 1, lines 1-2 and beginning of another stanza only), written two lines of verse per line of manuscript. Variant burden (Exultet celum laudibus).
BLAdd31042.Attributed Title: Exultit celum laudibus (top of 94v above these lines)
